resources.string:
The Home Page is used to upgrade your Talents, check your pack of dogs, and see your currency


 There are two currencies: Hearts and Heart Tokens. Both can be gained passively (see the Activities page)


 Talents give an overall bonus to multiple aspects of the game. Upgrade these with your Heart currency


 Each dog from your pack gives a multiplier bonus to your Hearts per second

Activities are the main way to gain more Hearts and Heart Tokens passively (even while offline)


 Upgrading them will yield higher returns


 Each activity has a different curve; don't put all your eggs in one basket!

The Petting minigame is useful for turning Heart Tokens into Hearts


 The goal is to tap on the square that appears as quick as possible


 Every square clicked will increase the speed. If it's too fast, upgrade the "Petting"-specific Talents!


 Every 10 squares will bump you into a new "threshold" so future runs can be set to the right difficulty


 You will always start at the threshold below your highest

The Tournament is a fun and rewarding way to turn your Heart Tokens into Hearts


 You will compete against 3 AI in 4 minigames, trying to get the highest score


 There is also a ranking system to give better rewards and beat stronger opponents!


 FIRST place increases your rank, and you can unlock a new Pack Dog!


 LAST place means you lose a rank and your entire bet...
